body: You may find something interesting when you are cleaning, analysing and interrogating your dataset. If this is significant, the next stage will be to communicate this to others. Data visualisations help communicate insight found in data in a quick and easy way.
title: Data visualisation techniques

_skills.outcome: Describe a number data visualisations and their usage
Choose an appropriate visualisation for data

_aboutPage.aboutCredit: This work "Data visualisation techniques", is a derivative of "Data visualisation formats" by the Open Data Institute, used under CC-BY 4.0.

body: This module explores digital maps: how open data can enhance maps; how to use maps in web sites and projects; and how to visualise and explore data with them.
title: Mapping open data

_skills.outcome: Explain the benefits of open mapping
Select the appropriate technique to describe something on a map
Create a number of different maps from open data
